description: An instance of the scene media events configuration.

onEnded.description: The onEnded event of the media. The action uid or an array of action uids. Works only on video media.
onEnded.title: onEnded

onPause.description: The onPause event of the media. The action uid or an array of action uids. Works only on video media.
onPause.title: onPause

onPlay.description: The onPlay event of the media. The action uid or an array of action uids. Works only on video media.
onPlay.title: onPlay

onSeeked.description: The onSeeked event of the media. The action uid or an array of action uids. Works only on video media.
onSeeked.title: onSeeked

title: SceneMediaEventsConfig
